tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    fixture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    next_maintenance_date DATE,
    alert_threshold INT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fixture_id INT,
    maintenance_type TEXT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_fixture_id FOREIGN KEY (fixture_id) REFERENCES smart_light_fixtures(fixture_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    alert_type TEXT,
    alert_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_schedule_id FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES maintenance_schedule(schedule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alert (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fixture_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_description TEXT,
    alert_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fixture_id INT,
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    next_maintenance_date DATE,
    alert_threshold INT
);

CREATE TABLE alert_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fixture_id INT,
    alert_date DATE,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE replacement_requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fixture_id INT,
    request_date DATE,
    reason TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);
